documents.text:
--- Visit 1 | Date: 2025-06-30 ---

Follow-up visit #1 for patient SA-P008.

On exam, BP is 156/90, pulse 71, wt 74.6 kg. Patient appears mildly fatigued but alert and oriented.

New AE: Vomiting. Severity: mild (Grade 1). Onset: day 5. Currently ongoing. Relatedness: possible. Treatment was held pending resolution. Dose interruption documented.
New onset diarrhea, Grade 1, started day 19. Resolved by day 48. Hydration encouraged. No dose modification required.

Laboratory results:
  - PSA: 6.4 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 16.9 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 32.68 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 13.51 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 3.99 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0] (LOW)
  - Creatinine: 0.76 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Plan: Supportive care as needed. Return for cycle 2 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 2 | Date: 2025-07-21 ---

Follow-up visit #2 for patient SA-P008.

Vital signs obtained: blood pressure 115/71, heart rate 76, weight 82.8 kg.

No new adverse events reported since last visit.

Labs drawn today:
  - PSA: 6.58 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 18.2 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 33.58 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 13.41 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5]
  - WBC: 3.4 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0] (LOW)
  - Creatinine: 0.86 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Imaging reveals meaningful tumor shrinkage consistent with partial response (PR). Target lesion regression of ~48.9%.

Serum PSA: 5.13 ng/mL, representing a decrease of 48.9% compared to baseline.

Plan: Supportive care as needed. Return for cycle 3 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 3 | Date: 2025-08-11 ---

Scheduled visit 3 was not completed. no answer.

Patient elected to withdraw consent and discontinue participation in the trial. Reason cited: personal/family considerations.

--- Visit 4 | Date: 2025-09-01 ---

Patient did not present for scheduled visit 4. Attempted phone contact — spoke with patient, rescheduling.

--- Visit 5 | Date: 2025-09-22 ---

Visit 5 — MISSED. Patient called to reschedule but did not attend. voicemail left.

--- Visit 6 | Date: 2025-10-13 ---

Patient did not present for scheduled visit 6. Attempted phone contact — patient's family member confirmed patient was unwell.

--- Visit 7 | Date: 2025-11-03 ---

Patient did not present for scheduled visit 7. Attempted phone contact — spoke with patient, rescheduling.

--- Visit 8 | Date: 2025-11-24 ---

No-show for cycle 8 visit. Staff attempted follow-up: patient's family member confirmed patient was unwell.
